Class CTL<S,P>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.logic.temporal.CTL<S,P>
public class CTL<S,P> extends Object
Computation Tree Logic (CTL).

CTL is a branching-time temporal logic used for model checking. It extends propositional logic with temporal operators: - AG Ï†: Ï† holds on All paths Globally - EG Ï†: Ï† holds on some path Globally - AF Ï†: Ï† holds on All paths Finally - EF Ï†: Ï† holds on some path Finally - A[Ï† U Ïˆ]: Ï† Until Ïˆ on All paths - E[Ï† U Ïˆ]: Ï† Until Ïˆ on some path

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
